data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prajapati, Dhruv A., Murthappa, Prashanthakumara S., Sankaran, Pradeep M., Sebastian, Pothalil A. (2016): Two new species of the ant-eating spider genus Tropizodium Jocqué & Churchill, 2005 (Araneae, Zodariidae, Zodariinae) from India. Zootaxa 4061 (5): 575-584, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.5.7
